Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ abba Makari pip~recbuteroc: nem nefs/ri n~c~taurovoroc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O Abba Makari the presbyter, and all his children the cross-bearers, that He may forgive us our sins.
إطلب من الرب عنا ياأنبا مقار القس وأولاده لابسى الصليب ليغفر لنا خطايانا.
